constituent: climate, marquis, person, stick, fred astaire, key, dart, drop, heavens
heisigStory: Marquis . . . walking stick. Note where the walking stick is positioned in this kanji.
koohiiStory1: The marquis has absolutely no interest in issuses of climate change. He´s old and near death. [Don´t forget the walking stick to symbolize his old age.].
koohiiStory2: The marquis moves to a warmer climate after he gets old enough to need a walking stick to get around.
words:
気候(きこう): climate
候補(こうほ): candidacy
天候(てんこう): weather
